description: The Charges API allows you to charge credit cards or payment sources.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: A positive integer in the smallest currency unit (e.g., 100 cents to charge 1.00 or 100 to charge 100, a zero-decimal currency) representing how much to charge the card.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

amount.description: Amount (in the smallest currency unit) of the charge.
